title: FS/FT:  T206 Cobb Bat on Shoulder SGC 3

posts.post_title: FS/FT:  T206 Cobb Bat on Shoulder SGC 3
posts.post_content:
No Longer Available. 

I have this very clean, centered Cobb Bat on Shoulder SGC 3. 

I would like to trade for a centered Bat on PSA 2.5 or PSA 3 and add cash. 

I would sell for $5500 Net. Add 3% for GS. 

PM with pics if you have interest.

Thank you!
